FuncDef: This command specifies the bandwidth to be signaled for the path of the GMPLS LSP. Bandwidth is specified in terms of the RFC 3471 signal type name.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the RFC 3471 name of the signal type representing the requested bandwidth for the GMPLS LSP path. Values-{ds0 | ds1 | e1 | ds2 | e2 | ethernet | e3 | ds3 | sts-1 | fast-ethernet | e4 | fc-0-133m | oc-3/stm1 | fc-0-266m | fc-0-531m | oc-12/stm-4 | gige | fc-0-1062m | oc-48/stm-16 | oc-192/stm-64 | 10gige-ieee | oc-768/stm-256 | 100gige-ieee}.
